What Are the Most Important Things Students Should Learn in School?

In your opinion, what are the most important things students should learn in school? What is the most important thing you have learned in school? How has this knowledge affected your life? How do you think it will help your success in the future?

---

In my opinion, the most important things that students will learn in school are the value of knowledge, discipline and hard work.   And most importantly, is the experience of acquiring knowledge and applying it to solve real-life problems.  All of these things will no doubt help individuals with their future success. Students can benefit from learning the important things of life, which include lessons on how to solve conflict, the ability to overcome difficulty, and realizing they have what it takes to be successful in life. The  most successful people have worked really hard on a consistent basis in order to achieve what they have.

Talent is a great thing to have but talent can be beat out with hard work, but if one is talented plus works hard then they have so much potential. I still think that consistency is the most important value to perform on a daily basis because most people are not consistent to the point of doing something even when they don't feel like doing it anymore when the novelty and excitement of a project has worn off. That's what makes the difference between people who achieve great things or not.

What Are the Most Important Things Students Should Learn in School?

In your opinion, what are the most important things students should learn in school? What is the most important thing you have learned in school? How has this knowledge affected your life? How do you think it will help your success in the future?

---

In my opinion, the most important things that students will learn in school are the value of knowledge, discipline and hard work.   And most importantly, is the experience of acquiring knowledge and applying it to solve real-life problems.  All of these things will no doubt help individuals with their future success. Students can benefit from learning the important things of life, which include lessons on how to solve conflict, the ability to overcome difficulty, and realizing they have what it takes to be successful in life. The  most successful people have worked really hard on a consistent basis in order to achieve what they have.

Talent is a great thing to have but talent can be beat out with hard work, but if one is talented plus works hard then they have so much potential. I still think that consistency is the most important value to perform on a daily basis because most people are not consistent to the point of doing something even when they don't feel like doing it anymore when the novelty and excitement of a project has worn off. That's what makes the difference between people who achieve great things or not. 

Consistency is also underrated by many people because people take it for granted that it is automatic to do something no matter how hard your might feel. So when they don't achieve the results they expect, they stop without even noticing. What many don't realize is that consistency and discipline go hand and in hand in achieving great success in anything in life. The most successful people were consistent in acquiring knowledge with consistent day-in and day-out discipline in order to apply that knowledge to solve real-life problems. Albert Einstein is one great example. He failed college math but he preserved until he learned everything that he wanted to and because of that he became one of the great scientists of humankind. 

If you follow these three principles of acquiring knowledge, having discipline consistently and to work hard you will be successful in life.
